data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lin, Yen-Po, Ding, Zheng Yee, Gullan, Penny J., Cook, Lyn G. (2017): A newly recognised Australian endemic species of Austrolecanium Gullan & Hodgson 1998 (Hemiptera: Coccidae) from Queensland. Zootaxa 4272 (1): 119-130, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4272.1.6|3 occurrences
